text: (pantalil) patarnta kotikalum, patarata cetikalum, peritta marankal ulla colaikalaiyum, pucikkakkutiya vitavitamana (payirkalaiyum) taniyankalaiyum, (parvaikku) onrupolum vevverakavum tonrakkutiya olivam, matulai (marrum palavakai kanivarkkankal) akiyavarraiyum avane pataittirukkiran. Akave, avai kayttup paluttal avarrai (taralamakap) puciyunkal. Avarrai aruvatai ceyyumpotu (iraivanukku nanri celuttuvatarkaka) atil avanutaiya pakattaiyum (jakattai) kotuttu vitunkal. Alavu katantu (vin) celavu ceyyatirkal. Enenral, alavu katantu (vin) celavu ceypavarkalai niccayamaka allah necippatillai
